name: BD31's Nextbots
description:
-  Outrun the rampaging nextbots filled with overloading tantrum of heat.

-  Entirely inspired by gmod nextbots. (with a little twist).

- Originally came out as an idea whilst playing around with nextbots within gmod.

One possible question out of the blue:

Is this an addon? No, this is actually a game constructed via Unreal Engine.

- 2 playable maps.

- 5 custom nextbots made from scratch.

- Difficulties based off from the nextbot's agility level.

- Extras (Nextbots info).

- Ai noded. (in UE4).

Find out the rest in game!
